description:
In his first match of the tournament, Yusuke can’t see a thing in the pitch-black arena, but Kibano is able to follow Urameshi’s every move. If the detective survives Kibano, his next fight – against a ninja – will start immediately!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: O luptă grea pentru Yusuke. Un contraatac sângeros
Yuusuke Kusen! Kizu Darake no Hangeki
幽助苦戦! 傷だらけの反撃!!
